item.title: US tariffs put 30,000 South African jobs at risk, officials say
item.description: South African authorities have warned that U.S. reciprocal tariffs could put an estimated 30,000 jobs at risk

item.title: Asian markets are mixed after Wall St tumbles following poor US jobs report
item.description: Global shares have mostly advanced after Wall Street had its worst day since May following the release of weak U.S. jobs data
